Branch.description: The branch or tag that will be checked out. Specify 'master' if you're not sure.

User.description: The username used to clone repository

PersonalAccessToken.description: Personal Access Token for accessing the Git repository.

DotenvFileUri.description: Dotenv file uri to set environment variable

ExposedPort.description: The port where application is exposed.

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('sh linux_install_bank_v1.sh ', parameters('Branch'), ' ', parameters('User'), ' ', parameters('PersonalAccessToken'), ' ', parameters('DotenvFileUri'), ' ', parameters('ExposedPort'))]
